item.title: 🐹 beankeji-cloud/SLiteIO (91 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: beankeji-cloud

📝 Repository: beankeji-cloud/SLiteIO

📄 Descrizione: SLiteIO is a cloud-native block storage solution for Kubernetes, using LVM and SPDK to provide both local volumes and high-performance NVMe-oF remote volumes. Its minimal I/O path delivers excellent performance even with standard SSDs, enabling dynamic block device provisioning in hyper-converged clusters.
